metadata.title: Elegance Linen Sheer Panel with Rod Pocket - Window Curtain 60-inch Width X 84-inch Length - Pink
features: USE TWO PANELS TO ACHIEVE THIS LOOK IN THE PICTURE
USE TWO PANELS TO ACHIEVE THIS LOOK IN THE PICTURE
description: This versatile curtain can be used for any room and will compliment any decor. This beautiful panel will give a perfect look in your living room or anywhere else.These Curtains are made of 100% polyester. Machine washable. Imported. NOTE : TO ACHIEVE THIS LOOK USE TWO PANELS. Care Instruction : Machine wash with mild soap and warm water. Delicate cycle. Cool touch up iron if desired.
